verses.verse: And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> being full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> returned <WG5290> from <WG575> Jordan <WG2446>, and <WG2532> was led <WG71> by <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048>,

Being <WG3985> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> tempted <WG3985> by <WG5259> the devil <WG1228>. And <WG2532> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> he did eat <WG5315> nothing <WG3756>: <WG3762> and <WG2532> when they <WG846> were ended <WG4931>, he afterward <WG5305> hungered <WG3983>.

And <WG2532> the devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, If <WG1487> you are <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, command <WG2036> this <WG5129> stone <WG3037> that <WG2443> it be made <WG1096> bread <WG740>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, It is written <WG1125>, That <WG3754> man <WG444> shall <WG2198> not <WG3756> live <WG2198> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone <WG3441>, but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> the devil <WG1228>, taking <WG321> him <WG846> up <WG321> into <WG1519> a <WG3735> high <WG5308> mountain <WG3735>, showed <WG1166> to him <WG846> all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world <WG3625> in <WG1722> a moment <WG4743> of time <WG5550>.

And <WG2532> the devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, All <WG537> this <WG3778> power <WG1849> will I give <WG1325> you <WG4671>, and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391> of them <WG846>: for that <WG3754> is delivered <WG3860> to me <WG1698>; and <WG2532> to whomever <WG1437> I will <WG2309> I give <WG1325> it <WG3739>.
If <WG1437> you <WG4771> therefore <WG3767> will worship <WG4352> <WG99999> me <WG3450>, all <WG3956> shall be <WG2071> yours <WG4675>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, Get you <WG5217> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450>, Satan <WG4567>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, You shall worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> your <WG4675> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> him <WG846> only <WG3441> shall you serve <WG3000>.

And <WG2532> he brought <WG71> him <WG846> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419>, and <WG2532> set <WG2476> him <WG846> on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple <WG2411>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, If <WG1487> you are <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, cast <WG906> yourself <WG4572> down <WG2736> from here <WG1782>:
For <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, He shall give <WG1781> his <WG846> angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> over <WG4012> you <WG4675>, to keep <WG1314> you <WG3754>:

And <WG2532> in <WG1909> their hands <WG5495> they shall bear <WG142> you <WG4571> up <WG142>, lest at any time <WG3379> you dash <WG4350> your <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone <WG3754>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> to him <WG846>, It is said <WG2046>, You shall <WG1598> not <WG3756> tempt <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> your <WG4675> God <WG3754>.
And <WG2532> when <WG4931> the devil <WG1228> had ended <WG4931> all <WG3956> the temptation <WG3986>, he departed <WG868> from <WG575> him <WG846> for <WG891> a season <WG2540>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> returned <WG5290> in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> Galilee <WG1056>: and <WG2532> there went out <WG1831> the fame <WG5345> of <WG4012> him <WG846> through <WG2596> all <WG3650> the region round about <WG4066>.
And <WG2532> he <WG846> taught <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues <WG4864>, being glorified <WG1392> by <WG5259> all <WG3956>.

And <WG2532> he came <WG2064> to <WG1519> Nazareth <WG3478>, where <WG3757> he had been <WG2258> brought up <WG5142>: and <WG2532>, as <WG2596> his <WG846> custom was <WG1486>, he went <WG1525> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864> on <WG1722> the sabbath <WG4521> day <WG2250>, and <WG2532> stood up <WG450> to read <WG314>.

And <WG2532> there was delivered <WG1929> to him <WG846> the book <WG975> of the prophet <WG4396> Isaiah <WG2268>. And <WG2532> when he had opened <WG380> the book <WG975>, he found <WG2147> the place <WG5117> where <WG3757> it was <WG2258> written <WG1125>,

The Spirit <WG4151> of the Lord <WG2962> is upon <WG1909> me <WG1691>, because <WG1752> he has anointed <WG5548> me <WG3165> to preach the gospel <WG2097> to the poor <WG4434>; he has sent <WG649> me <WG3165> to heal <WG2390> the brokenhearted <WG2588>, to preach <WG2784> deliverance <WG859> to the captives <WG164>, and <WG2532> recovering of sight <WG309> to the blind <WG5185>, to set <WG649> at <WG1722> liberty <WG859> them that are bruised <WG3739>,
To preach <WG2784> the acceptable <WG1184> year <WG1763> of the Lord <WG2962>.

And <WG2532> he closed <WG4428> the book <WG975>, and he gave <WG591> it again <WG591> to the minister <WG5257>, and sat down <WG2523>. And <WG2532> the eyes <WG3788> of all them <WG3956> that were <WG2258> in <WG1722> the synagogue <WG4864> were fastened <WG816> on him <WG846>.
And <WG1161> he began <WG756> to say <WG3004> to <WG4314> them <WG846>, This day <WG4594> is <WG4137> this <WG3778> scripture <WG1124> fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> ears <WG3775>.

And <WG2532> all <WG3956> bore <WG3140> him <WG846> witness <WG3140>, and <WG2532> wondered <WG2296> at <WG1909> the <WG3056> gracious <WG5485> words <WG3056> which <WG3588> proceeded <WG1607> out of <WG1537> his <WG846> mouth <WG4750>. And <WG2532> they said <WG3004>, Is <WG2076> not <WG3756> this <WG3778> Joseph <WG2501>'s son <WG5207>?

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> to <WG4314> them <WG846>, You will <WG2046> surely <WG3843> say <WG2046> to me <WG3427> this <WG3778> proverb <WG3850>, Physician <WG2395>, heal <WG2323> yourself <WG4572>: whatever <WG3745> we have heard <WG191> done <WG1096> in <WG1722> Capernaum <WG2584>, do <WG4160> also <WG2532> here <WG5602> in <WG1722> your <WG4675> country <WG3968>.
And <WG1161> he said <WG2036>, Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you <WG5213>, No <WG3762> prophet <WG4396> is <WG2076> accepted <WG1184> in <WG1722> his own <WG846> country <WG3968>.

But <WG1161> I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> of <WG1909> a truth <WG225>, many <WG4183> widows <WG5503> were <WG2258> in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of Elijah <WG2243>, when <WG3753> the heaven <WG3772> was shut up <WG2808> <WG99999> three <WG5140> years <WG2094> and <WG2532> six <WG1803> months <WG3376>, when <WG5613> great <WG3173> famine <WG3042> was <WG1096> throughout <WG1909> all <WG3956> the land <WG1093>;

But <WG2532> to <WG4314> none <WG3762> of them <WG846> was <WG3992> Elijah <WG2243> sent <WG1487>, except <WG3361> to <WG1519> Sarepta <WG4558>, a city of Sidon <WG4605>, to <WG4314> a woman <WG1135> that was a widow <WG5503>.

And <WG2532> many <WG4183> lepers <WG3015> were <WG2258> in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474> in the time <WG1909> of Eliseus <WG1666> the prophet <WG4396>; and <WG2532> none <WG3762> of them <WG846> was cleansed <WG1487>, except <WG3361> Naaman <WG3497> the Syrian <WG4948>.
And <WG2532> all they <WG3956> in <WG1722> the synagogue <WG4864>, when they heard <WG191> these things <WG5023>, were filled <WG4130> with wrath <WG2372>,

And <WG2532> rose up <WG450>, and thrust <WG1544> him <WG846> out of <WG1854> the city <WG4172>, and <WG2532> led <WG71> him <WG846> to <WG2193> the brow <WG3790> of the hill <WG3735> on <WG1909> which their <WG846> city <WG4172> was built <WG3618>, that <WG1519> they might cast <WG2630> him <WG846> down headlong <WG3739>.
But <WG1161> he <WG846> passing <WG1330> through <WG1223> the midst <WG3319> of them <WG846> went his way <WG4198>,
And <WG2532> came down <WG2718> to <WG1519> Capernaum <WG2584>, a city <WG4172> of Galilee <WG1056>, and <WG2532> <WG99999> taught <WG1321> them <WG846> on <WG1722> the sabbath days <WG4521>.
And <WG2532> they were astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> his <WG846> teaching <WG1322>: for <WG3754> his <WG846> word <WG3056> was <WG2258> with <WG1722> power <WG1849>.

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> the synagogue <WG4864> there was <WG2258> a man <WG444>, which had <WG2192> a spirit <WG4151> of an unclean <WG169> devil <WG1140>, and <WG2532> cried out <WG349> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>,

Saying <WG3004>, Let <WG1436> us alone <WG1436>; what <WG5101> have we to do <WG2254> with you <WG4671>, you Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth <WG3479>? Have you come <WG2064> to destroy <WG622> us <WG2248>? I know <WG1492> you <WG4571> who <WG5101> you are <WG1488>; the Holy One <WG40> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> rebuked <WG2008> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Hold your peace <WG5392>, and <WG2532> come out <WG1831> of <WG1537> him <WG846>. And when <WG2532> the devil <WG1140> had thrown <WG4496> him <WG846> in <WG1519> the midst <WG3319>, he came <WG1831> out of <WG575> him <WG846>, and hurt <WG984> him <WG846> not <WG3367>.

And <WG2532> they were <WG1096> all <WG3956> <WG99999> amazed <WG2285>, and <WG2532> spoke <WG4814> among <WG4314> themselves <WG240>, saying <WG3004>, What <WG5101> a word <WG3056> is this <WG3778>! For <WG3754> with <WG1722> authority <WG1849> and <WG2532> power <WG1411> he commanded <WG2004> the unclean <WG169> spirits <WG4151>, and <WG2532> they come out <WG1831>.
And <WG2532> the fame <WG2279> of <WG4012> him <WG846> went out <WG1607> into <WG1519> every <WG3956> place <WG5117> of the country round about <WG4066>.

And <WG1161> he arose <WG450> out of <WG1537> the synagogue <WG4864>, and entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> Simon <WG4613>'s house <WG3614>. And <WG1161> Simon <WG4613>'s wife <WG3994>'s mother was <WG2258> taken with <WG4912> a great <WG3173> fever <WG4446>; and <WG2532> they begged <WG2065> him <WG846> for <WG4012> her <WG846>.

And <WG2532> he stood <WG2186> over <WG1883> her <WG846>, and rebuked <WG2008> the fever <WG4446>; and <WG2532> it left <WG863> her <WG846>: and <WG1161> immediately <WG3916> she arose <WG450> and served <WG1247> them <WG846>.

Now when <WG1161> the sun <WG2246> was setting <WG1416>, all <WG3956> they that <WG3745> had <WG2192> any sick <WG770> with various <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> brought <WG71> them <WG846> to <WG4314> him <WG846>; and <WG1161> he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of them <WG846>, and healed <WG2323> them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> demons <WG1140> also <WG2532> came out <WG1831> of <WG575> many <WG4183>, crying out <WG2896>, and <WG2532> saying <WG3754>, You <WG4771> are <WG1488> Christ <WG5547> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>. And <WG2532> he rebuking <WG2008> them allowed <WG1439> them <WG846> not <WG3756> to speak <WG2980>: for <WG3754> they knew <WG1492> that he <WG846> was <WG1511> Christ <WG5547>.

And <WG1161> when it was <WG1096> day <WG2250>, he departed <WG1831> and went <WG4198> into <WG1519> a desert <WG2048> place <WG5117>: and <WG2532> the people <WG3793> sought <WG2212> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> to <WG2193> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> held <WG2722> him <WG846>, that he should not <WG3361> depart <WG4198> from <WG575> them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> to <WG4314> them <WG3754>, I <WG3165> must <WG1163> preach <WG2097> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> to other <WG2087> cities <WG4172> also <WG2532>: for <WG3754> this <WG1519> reason <WG5124> am I sent <WG649>.
And <WG2532> <WG99999> he preached <WG2784> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864> of Galilee <WG1056>.
